text.__SUMMARY__:
Albizia edwallii is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Argentina and Brazil.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Albizia edwarllii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T36581A10002971. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T36581A10002971.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
